title: PoI-17605("墨丘莉娅")的档案
content:
[[>]]
> = //“[[span class="ruby"]]整个世界在慢慢改变[[span class="rt"]]All of the world is slowly changing[[/span]][[/span]]，[[span class="ruby"]]我却追不上它的步伐[[span class="rt"]]In a way I can not catch up with[[/span]][[/span]]”//
> //——MYTH & ROID《shadowgraph》//
[[/>]]
author: Mercuresphere
